title: Forten and Perrott on Colonization - context

content.question: Which of the following developments in the early- to mid-nineteenth century most directly enabled the emergence of the political movement that is being criticized in the source?

choices.label: The spread of abolition in Latin America and the continuation of slavery and racial discrimination in the United States
The expansion of European colonial control in Africaâ€™s interior and the founding of white settler colonies in South Africa

content.answer: The spread of abolition in Latin America and the continuation of slavery and racial discrimination in the United States
